creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Scenario:
- Have a simple Test with 1 Thread Group having a Debug Sampler child and View Results Tree
- Run test
- Select sampler, you have 3 tabs shown => OK
- Select Any other renderer than text, for example Regex Tester => No more tabs shown => KO


I think this one is blocker.
